Package com.twilio4j.twism

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DialParameters
    Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the 'action' URL of Dial.
    EnqueueParameters
    Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the 'action' URL parameter of Enqueue.
    EnqueueWaitParameters
    Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the 'action' URL parameter of Enqueue.
    GatherParameters
    Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the 'action' URL of Gather.
    QueueParameters
    Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the value of the 'url' attribute of Queue.
    RecordParameters
    Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the 'action' URL of Record.
    SmsParameters
    Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the 'statusCallback' URL of Sms.
    TranscribeParameters
    Twilio will pass the following parameters in addition to the standard TwiML Voice request parameters with its request to the 'transcribeCallback' URL of Record.
    TwilioStateMachineServlet.TwilioCallback
    A TwilioCallback is used only to execute some java code, and *not* return TwiML.
    TwilioStateMachineServlet.TwilioHandler
    A TwilioHandler is used execute some java code and return TwiML.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CookieTwism
    A cookie represented by CookieTwism is used to persist state during a call.
    TwilioParameters
    TwilioParameters are passed to your action and callback handlers.
    TwilioStateMachine  
    TwilioStateMachineServlet<E extends java.lang.Enum<?>>
    TwilioStateMachineServlet is the class you need to extend in order to create your own call flow state machine.
    TwilioStateMachineServletBase
    TwilioStateMachineServletBase accepts HTTP GET and POST connections from Twilio, and advances a phone call through the various states of a state machine.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Method
    Enumerated values for HTTP methods that may be used with an 'action' or 'callback'.
    QueueResult
    These are the possible values that can be returned as a QueueResult parameter from an 'action' callback of the Enqueue verb.
    TranscriptionStatus
    These are the possible values that can be returned as a parameter from a transcribeCallback of the Record verb.
    TwilioParameters.CallStatus  
    TwilioParameters.DialCallStatus  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CookieTamperedException
    The cookie used to persist state during a call is digitally signed with a hash.
